t: Ermenegildo Zegna: The Visionary Founder of ZEGNA | ZEGNA ROW
s: Born in 1892 in Trivero, Italy, Ermenegildo Zegna was a textile visionary. In 1938, he brought his quality fabrics to New York City and was awarded the title Count of Monte Rubello.
